2. Remove the old labels and / or any written useless.
3. Seal the box with tape transport.
4. Put the label to the outside of the box or pallet (preferably in the middle). It will then be verified and validated by the carrier during the retreat.
Mode of packing:
1. Protection on the edges (5 cm corner of the card) and on the corners of all four extremities
2. Vertical straps and multiple layers (minimum 2 rounds) of cellophane for partial shipments.
3. Vertical straps and multiple layers (minimum 2 rounds) of cellophane on all pallets stacked.
4. No shipment will be accepted if the freight is packed on top of the solar panels.
